emptyState.title: No Roadmap Yet
emptyState.description: Generate an AI-powered roadmap that understands your project's target audience and creates a strategic feature plan.

header.analyzedCompetitors: Analyzed {{count}} competitors with {{painPoints}} pain points identified
header.addFeatureTooltip: Add a new feature to the roadmap

featureDetail.deleteConfirm: This will permanently remove "{{title}}" from your roadmap.

dialog.title: Enable Competitor Analysis?
dialog.description: Enhance your roadmap with insights from competitor products
dialog.identifyCompetitors: Identifies 3-5 main competitors based on your project type
dialog.searchFeedback: Searches app stores, forums, and social media for user feedback and pain points
dialog.suggestFeatures: Suggests features that address gaps in competitor products
dialog.privacyDescription: This feature will perform web searches to gather competitor information. Your project name and type will be used in search queries. No code or sensitive data is shared.
dialog.optionalInfo: You can generate a roadmap without competitor analysis if you prefer. The roadmap will still be based on your project structure and best practices.

viewer.title: Competitor Analysis Results
viewer.description: Analyzed {{count}} competitors to identify market gaps and opportunities
